data.title: Cannabis Control Appeals Panel Notice of Proposed Rulemaking
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The Cannabis Control Appeals Panel (Panel) proposes to adopt the proposed regulations described below after considering all comments, objections, and recommendations regarding the proposed action. These proposed regulations and rulemaking documents are also available on California’s Cannabis Portal. Proposed Rules 6000-6018, Appeals Procedures: Text of Proposed Regulations (Rules 6000-6018)Â  Notice of Proposed Rulemaking Action Initial […]
